name: Fantasy
description: Fiction that commonly uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary plot element, theme, or setting.

name: Science Fiction
description: Fiction that deals with futuristic concepts such as advanced science and technology, space exploration, time travel, parallel universes, and extraterrestrial life.

name: Mystery
description: Fiction dealing with the solution of a crime or the unraveling of secrets.

name: Classic Literature
description: Literature that is considered to be of the highest artistic merit and has stood the test of time.

name: Horror
description: Fiction intended to disturb, frighten, or create suspense through atmosphere and intrigue.

name: Romance
description: Fiction that places its primary focus on the relationship and romantic love between two people.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Fiction set in the past, typically in a particular historical period, and attempting to convey the spirit and social conditions of a former age.

name: Dystopian
description: Fiction set in an imagined world or society in which people lead wretched, dehumanized, fearful lives.
